metadata.synopsis: One of the hostages thanks you for saving them from the Iron Throne. One-liner dialog.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Speak to Flansy Thornwhist - S_GLO_IronThrone_Group6_Prisoner1 5377cb38-731d-4582-9396-98529856cdbf - (0; 39; 66)  in the Dock warehouse after saving them.Quick setup:- Load CTY_Main_A- Use Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 9)- Set Quest Flags and Options -> Act3 (LOW) -> Iron Throne -> Change State -> Back At Docks -> MajoritySaved- Then talk to the NPC

1.speaker: Flansy Thornwhist
1.text: Why would anyone do something so cruel? So heartless? It hurts...
